        "CALCULATION": "csv.ESTAB.PAY_ANN_VAL",
        "Temp or Perm": "P",
        "Order": 1,
        "Flag": "D"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": { "NAICS2": ['31', '32', '33'] },
        "UNIT": "KAU",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "CAPEX_NEW_TOT_SUM",
        "DESCRIPTION": "Sum estab new capital expenditures to KAU",
        "CALCULATION": "csv.ESTAB.CAPEX_NEW_TOT_DVAL",
        "Temp or Perm": "P"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": "All",
        "UNIT": "KAU",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "CAPEX_TOT_DVAL_SUM",
        "DESCRIPTION": "Sum estab capital expenditures to KAU ",
        "CALCULATION": "csv.ESTAB.CAPEX_TOT",

        "Order": 1,
        "Flag": "D"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": "All",
        "UNIT": "KAU",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "CAPEX_MACH_TOT_SUM ",
        "DESCRIPTION": "Sum estab machinery capital expenditures to KAU ",

    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": "All",
        "UNIT": "COMPANY",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "CAPEX_MACH_TOT_SUM ",
        "DESCRIPTION": "Sum KAU machinery capital expenditures to  Company",
        "CALCULATION": "csv.KAU.CAPEX_MACH_TOT",
        "Temp or Perm": "P",
        "Order": 1,
        "Flag": "D"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": "All",
        "UNIT": "COMPANY",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "CAPEX_TOT_DVAL_SUM",
        "DESCRIPTION": "Sum KAU capital expenditures to Company ",
        "CALCULATION": "csv.KAU.CAPEX_TOT"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": "All",
        "UNIT": "COMPANY",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "EMP_MAR12_VAL_SUM ",
        "DESCRIPTION": "Sum KAU employment to Company",
        "CALCULATION": "csv.KAU.EMP_MAR12_VAL",
        "Temp or Perm": "P"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": "All",
        "UNIT": "COMPANY",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "PAY_QTR1_VAL_SUM ",

        "DERIVED ITEM": "PAY_ANN_VAL_SUM ",
        "DESCRIPTION": "Sum estabs payroll to KAU",
        "CALCULATION": "csv.KAU.PAY_ANN_VAL",
        "Temp or Perm": "P"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": "All",
        "UNIT": "COMPANY",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "csv.RCPT_TOT_VAL_SUM ",
        "DESCRIPTION": "Sum KAU receipts to KAU",
        "CALCULATION": "csv.KAU.RCPT_TOT_VAL",
        "Temp or Perm": "P"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": "All",
        "UNIT": "KAU",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "CAPEX_NEW_TOT_SUM ",
        "DESCRIPTION": "Sum KAU new capital expenditures to Company",
        "CALCULATION": "csv.KAU.CAPEX_NEW_TOT_DVAL",
        "Temp or Perm": "P"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": { "NAICS4": ['4251'] },
        "UNIT": "KAU",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "RCPT_AGBR_REV_DVAL",
        "CALCULATION": "csv.RCPT_OWN_VAL + csv.RCPT_COMSN_EARN_VAL",
        "Temp or Perm": "P",
        "Order": 1,
        "Flag": "D"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": { "NAICS4": ['4251'] },
        "UNIT": "KAU",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "RCPT_COMSN_AVG_RATE_RAT",
        "DESCRIPTION": "derived commission rate",
        "CALCULATION": "csv.RCPT_COMSN_EARN_VAL/csv.RCPT_COMSN_GSV_VAL",
        "Temp or Perm": "P",
        "Order": 1,
        "Flag": "D"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": { "NAICS2": ['42'] },
        "UNIT": "KAU",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "RCPT_STOR_DVAL",
        "DESCRIPTION": "non-ecommerce (in-store)",
        "CALCULATION": "csv.RCPT_TOT_VAL-csv.RCPT_ECOMM_VAL",
        "Temp or Perm": "P",
        "Order": 1,
        "Flag": "D"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": { "NAICS3": ['423', '424'] },
        "UNIT": "KAU",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "INV_DOM_DVAL",
        "DESCRIPTION": "inventory IN the US",
        "CALCULATION": "csv.INV_CY_TOT-csv.INV_ENROUTE_VAL",
        "Temp or Perm": "P",
        "Order": 1,
        "Flag": "D"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": { "NAICS2": ['31', '32', '33'] },
        "UNIT": "Estab/all?",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "EXPS_CSTMTOT_DVAL",
        "DESCRIPTION": "deriving ASM/EC mfg collected total cost item, needed to make use of VALUE_ADDED item straight-forward in tabbing and disclosure",
        "CALCULATION": "csv.EXPS_MAT_V1_VAL + csv.EXP_RESALE_VAL + csv.EXPS_FUEL_VAL + csv.EXPS_ELEC_VAL + csv.EXPS_CONTRACT_VAL",
        "Temp or Perm": "p"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": { "NAICS2": ['31', '32', '33'] },
        "UNIT": "Estab/all?",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "EXPS_RPTOT_DVAL",
        "DESCRIPTION": "deriving ASM/EC mfg collected total rental payments ",
        "CALCULATION": "csv.EXPS_RENT_BUILD_VAL + csv.EXPS_RENT_MACH_VAL",
        "Temp or Perm": "p"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": { "NAICS2": ['31', '32', '33'] },
        "UNIT": "Estab/all?",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "EXPS_PCHTT_DVAL",
        "DESCRIPTION": "deriving ASM/EC mfg collected total purchased services",
        "CALCULATION": "csv.EXPS_TEMPSTAF_VAL + csv.EXPS_COMPTR_OTHEQ_VAL + csv.EXPS_EXSOFT_VAL + csv.EXPS_COMMSVC_VAL + csv.EXPS_DATAPROC_VAL + csv.EXPS_BUILD_REP_VAL + csv.EXPS_MACH_REP_VAL + csv.EXPS_REFUSE_VAL + csv.EXPS_ADVERT_VAL + csv.EXPS_PROFTECH_VAL + csv.EXPS_TAX_VAL + csv.EXPS_OTHER_VAL",
        "Temp or Perm": "p"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": { "NAICS2": ['31', '32', '33'] },
        "UNIT": "Estab/all?",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "VALUE_ADDED_DVAL",
        "DESCRIPTION": "Value Added formula from ASM/EC mfg, uses the recently created derived 'total costs'  Additions and Subtractions can be sequenced differently if needed",
        "CALCULATION": "csv.RCPT_TOT_VAL + csv.INV_CY_FINISHED_VAL + csv.INV_CY_WRKPROC_VAL - csv.EXPS_CSTMTOT_DVAL - csv.INV_PY_FINISHED_VAL - csv.INV_PY_WRKPROC_VAL",
        "Temp or Perm": "P",
        "Order": 1,
        "Flag": "D"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": { "NAICS2": ['22'] },
        "UNIT": "KAU",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "RCPT_MOTR_AGR_DVAL",
        "DESCRIPTION": "Agricultural Products motor carrier revenue",
        "CALCULATION": "(csv.RCPT_MOTR_AGR_PCT*csv.RCPT_MOTR_VAL)/100",
        "Temp or Perm": "P",
        "Order": 1,
        "Flag": "D"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": { "NAICS3": ['484'] },
        "UNIT": "KAU",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "RCPT_MOTR_GRAIN_DVAL",
        "DESCRIPTION": "Grains, Alcohol, Tobacco Products motor carrier revenue",
        "CALCULATION": "(csv.RCPT_MOTR_GRAIN_PCT*csv.RCPT_MOTR_VAL)/100",
        "Temp or Perm": "P",
        "Order": 1,
        "Flag": "D"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": { "NAICS3": ['484'] },
        "UNIT": "KAU",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "RCPT_MOTR_STONE_DVAL",
        "DESCRIPTION": "Stone, Nonmetallic minerals motor carrier revenue",

        "Temp or Perm": "P",
        "Order": 1,

    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": { "NAICS3": ['484'] },
        "UNIT": "KAU",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "RCPT_MOTR_FUEL_DVAL",
        "DESCRIPTION": "Coal and Petroleum Products motor carrier revenue",
        "CALCULATION": "(csv.RCPT_MOTR_FUEL_PCT*csv.RCPT_MOTR_VAL)/100",
        "Temp or Perm": "P",
        "Order": 1,
        "Flag": "D"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": { "NAICS3": ['484'] },
        "UNIT": "KAU",
        "DERIVED ITEM": "RCPT_MOTR_PHARM_DVAL",
        "DESCRIPTION": "Pharmaceutical and chemical products motor carrier revenue",
        "CALCULATION": "(csv.RCPT_MOTR_PHARM_PCT*csv.RCPT_MOTR_VAL)/100",
        "Temp or Perm": "P",
        "Order": 1,
        "Flag": "D"
    },
    {
        "NAICS/Tax status": { "NAICS3": ['484'] },

for (const json of items) {
    const naicsStatus = json["NAICS/Tax status"];
    const unit = json["UNIT"];
    const derivedItem = json["DERIVED ITEM"];
    const calculation = json["CALCULATION"];

    if (
        naicsStatus &&
        unit === csv["UNIT"]
    ) {
        if (naicsStatus == "All") {
            try {
                const derivedValue = eval(calculation);
                csv[derivedItem] = derivedValue;
                csv.Perm = json["Temp or Perm"] || "P";
                csv.Order = json["Order"] || 1;
                csv.Flag = json["Flag"] || "D";
            } catch (error) {
                console.error("Missing necessary variables for calculation:", error);
            }
        } else {
            if ((naicsStatus.NAICS2 && naicsStatus.NAICS2.includes(csv["NAICS2"]?.toString())) || (naicsStatus.NAICS3 && naicsStatus.NAICS3.includes(csv["NAICS3"]?.toString())) || (naicsStatus.NAICS4 && naicsStatus.NAICS4.includes(csv["NAICS4"]?.toString())) || (naicsStatus.NAICS5 && naicsStatus.NAICS5.includes(csv["NAICS5"]?.toString())) || (naicsStatus.NAICS6 && naicsStatus.NAICS6.includes(csv["NAICS6"]?.toString()))) {
                if ((!naicsStatus["NAICS3!"] && !naicsStatus["NAICS4!"]) || (naicsStatus["NAICS3!"] && !naicsStatus["NAICS3!"].includes(csv["NAICS3"].toString())) || (naicsStatus["NAICS4!"] && !naicsStatus["NAICS4!"].includes(csv["NAICS4"].toString()))) {
                    if (!naicsStatus["_TXRCD00"] || (naicsStatus["_TXRCD00"] && naicsStatus["_TXRCD00"].includes(csv["_TXRCD00"]))) {
                        try {
                            const derivedValue = eval(calculation);
                            csv[derivedItem] = derivedValue;
                            csv.Perm = json["Temp or Perm"] || "P";
                            csv.Order = json["Order"] || 1;
                            csv.Flag = json["Flag"] || "D";
                        } catch (error) {
                            console.error("Missing necessary variables for calculation:", error);
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
